title: Expnaded search result
description: if child query returns more then 1 result of same parent, then expanding the result will throw exception

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
Please raise this on the user's list first, then if it's confirmed as a code problem/enhancement then raise a JIRA.

Closing because there isn't even a fraction of the information here that would allow someone to reproduce the error. No sample documents. No sample query. No stack trace. etc.
